title: Aalina of the Twin legion
name: aalina
description: A cleric from the "[twinlegion]". A woman covered in full metal armor, and is seemingly cripped. She is always seen on her brother [haveron] back. She has never been seen speaking
combat: Aalina can cast a spell which puts targets to sleep, as she demonstrated on [quinn]
origin: Haveron said him and Aalina are both from the twin legion to the band of TEMP
charRelationships: -Seems to be only understood by Haveron
